apps.title: Odin's Forecast
apps.description: Ever wondered what Odin thought of our current weather application solutions? Well he thinks they're all rubbish so he tasked me with building a version that would master all others. This is it. Use responsibly.

apps.title: Odin's Book
apps.description: Apparently Odin loves to be social but he didn't fancy any of these other social media 'gimmicks' as he calls them. So he paid me a lot of money and awared me eternal life to bring his idea of the perfect social media app to life
